name: Leather Backpack
description: The Leather Backpack is an inexpensive craftable backpack that adds weight carrying capacity, reduces the weight of carried ores and provides six inventory slots. It provides a minimal backpack for the early game to haul ores and other goods across Icarus.
crafted_at: Lagos Unit dispatcher on Ceres Station

base_recipe.crafted_at: Lagos Unit dispatcher on Ceres Station
